typeDescription.name: edu.cmu.cs.lti.zhengzhl.ComponentAnnotation
typeDescription.description: The base type that extends annotation. Two features are added into this type: 1. componentId 2. confidence

featureDescription.name: componentId
featureDescription.description: the component identifier used to indicate the source where the annotation comes from.

featureDescription.name: confidence
featureDescription.description: the confidence score by the annotator that produce this annotation

typeDescription.name: edu.cmu.cs.lti.zhengzhl.ComponentTop
typeDescription.description: A base type that extends TOP, with 2 new features: 1. Component Id, that indicate the source of annotation 2. Confidence, that indicate the confidence the annotator gives

featureDescription.name: componentId
featureDescription.description: the component identifier used to indicate the source where the annotation comes from.

featureDescription.name: confidence
